examples.text: sorular sikimsonik oldugu icin ben yatana kadar online, sonra silicem
examples.translation: since the questions are fucking stupid I am online until I go to bed, I'll delete [it] later

examples.text: aq su sikimsonik yanıt verme şeyi nerden çıktı amk bos bos kafa sikiyorlar bi bu eksikti
examples.translation: omfg where did this stupid fucking answering thing come from it is so unnecessarily fucking annoying as if this was very needed

examples.text: Bu kadar sikimsonik bir aforizma daha yok
examples.translation: there's no other more of a stupid fucking aphorism than this
